Description.Text:
Property Location
Conrad London St. James is in the heart of London, walking distance from Westminster Abbey and Houses of Parliament. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of St. James Park and Big Ben.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 256 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have hair dryers and bathrobes. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and wedding services. Additional features include a fireplace in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in London? This hotel has 6187 square feet (575 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available 24 hours) and a train station pick-up service.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and wedding services. Additional features include a fireplace in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 256 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have hair dryers and bathrobes. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Conrad London St. James is in the heart of London, walking distance from Westminster Abbey and Houses of Parliament. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of St. James Park and Big Ben.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Queen Elizabeth II Conference Centre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Westminster Abbey - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Houses of Parliament - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
St. James Park - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Parliament Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Big Ben - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
St. James's Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Cabinet War Rooms - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Westminster Cathedral - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Buckingham Palace - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Victoria Tower - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
The Mall - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Queen's Gallery - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Royal Mews - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Horse Guard's Parade - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 22.2 km / 13.8 mi

The preferred airport for Conrad London St. James is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Message.Text: Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%

Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: No show & early departures 100% charges apply. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. One child under the age of 12 stays free when sharing parent’s room, subject to availability. Dependent on room size, you may be required to pay for an upgrade to the next room type. 2016 - 2017 CONTRACT
